title: Define Project Scope and Requirements (Revised)
description: Gather and document comprehensive requirements for the AlgorithmicArtStudio platform. This includes features, user stories, technical specifications, and non-functional requirements such as performance, scalability, security, accessibility, and maintainability. The requirements should cater to various user roles (learners, instructors, administrators), considering their respective needs. In addition, the requirements document should outline the interaction between these roles for a seamless user experience. This task will be further divided into the following sub-tasks: 1. Gather functional and non-functional requirements, 2. Define user stories, 3. Document technical specifications, 4. Establish performance, scalability, security, accessibility, and maintainability standards, 5. Collaborate with relevant stakeholders to validate and refine the requirements document, and 6. Provide clear guidelines for developers (frontend and backend) regarding the implementation of these requirements. Upon completion of these sub-tasks, this task will be considered complete. To ensure a holistic approach, it is recommended that team members from different roles participate in the validation process to cover all perspectives. This task is currently in progress.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the frontend, backend, database, and infrastructure components.

title: Develop Frontend
description: Implement the user interface and interactive components for creating and visualizing algorithmic art.

title: Develop Backend
description: Implement the server-side logic, API endpoints, and integration with the database and other services.

title: Set up Database
description: Design and implement the database schema and data storage solution for user data, artwork, and other application data.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Ensure the platform is secure by implementing authentication, authorization, and other security best practices.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Configure the CI/CD pipeline for automated testing, building, and deploying the application to various environments.

title: Write Documentation
description: Create comprehensive documentation for developers, users, and other stakeholders, including installation guides, API references, and user manuals.

title: Conduct Testing
description: Plan and execute various types of testing, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests, to ensure the quality and functionality of the platform.
